Description: Register 1946: Three glass beads, two of which are chipped, wound, dark blue colour.
Curator's comments: Register 1946: Glass beads (3), two of which are chipped, wound, dark blue colour. "Glass beads said to come 'from the East' (?Egypt)."
Condition: Register 1946: Two of which are chipped.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Donald H F Wilson
Acquisition notes: Af1946,18.1 to 397 is a collection of contemporary objects purchased in Nigerian markets by H J Braunholtz, the Keeper of the Department of Ethnography in the BM, on a study visit in 1946. The Register contains his notes on the local name, function and place of acquisition of each item. Af1946,18.1 to 244 were registered in 1946 or later. Af1946,245 to 380 were added in 1957, still using the 1946 register sequence. Nos.383 to 397 were added at a yet later date. Register 1946: Bought at KANO market 20.3.1946 for 6d
